name: 2nd Edition of International Vaccines Congress
content: Following the success of our online vaccine conference, we are excited to announce that the “2nd Edition of International Vaccines Congress” (IVC 2022) will be held in Virtual format on October 19-20, 2022\. The Vaccine congress will be held upon the theme “Synergy to Rehabilitate Innovations in Vaccine Research and Development.” IVC 2022 is the world’s leading vaccine conference. This one gathering includes the entire vaccination value chain, from basic research to commercial manufacture. The congress will witness the attendance of doyens in the field of vaccine development, research and manufacture including researchers, scientists, academicians, healthcare professionals, pharmacists, clinicians and big pharma companies. This is the most significant meeting you will attend if you are working in the domains of vaccine or are new to it as a result of the pandemic. Our motto is to share recent trends and innovations and provide ground-breaking ideas to the scientific community which will help tackle the pandemic of emerging and re-emerging infectious diseases. This worldwide vaccines event offers plenary talks, keynote speeches, symposiums, panel discussions, workshops, oral and poster presentations in the field of vaccine.
